articles.title: PM Modi meets Indian diaspora in Berlin | LIVE Updates - Hindustan Times
articles.description: PM Narendra Modi in Europe: During his three-day Europe visit, PM Modi will visit Germany, France and Denmark.
articles.content:
Before embarking on his European trip, PM Modi had tweeted:
In the coming days, I will be visiting Germany, Denmark and France for important bilateral and multilateral engagements. The first leg of … [+310 chars]

articles.title: EPL: Arsenal’s return to European football confirmed after West Ham victory - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Arsenal will definitely play European football next season, following their 2-1 win at West Ham on Sunday. Rob Holding and Gabriel Magalhaes scored for the Gunners, as they claimed their third successive win in the Premier League. The win took them back to fo…
